mapper.select: WITH range AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS s, TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS e FROM dual ), days AS ( SELECT s + LEVEL - 1 AS DT FROM range CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (e - s) + 1 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(d.DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS u WHERE TRUNC(u.CREATED_AT) = d.DT) AS CNT FROM days d ORDER BY d.DT
SELECT LEVEL_STRING AS LV, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM LOGGING_EVENT WHERE TIMESTMP BETWEEN #{fromMs} AND #{toMs} GROUP BY LEVEL_STRING
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LOGGING_EVENT WHERE LEVEL_STRING = 'ERROR' AND TIMESTMP BETWEEN #{fromMs} AND #{toMs}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE TRUNC(CREATED_AT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
